comment: Smells of delicate malt with a hint of grapes. Very mild, almost sweet malty taste, with light notes of caramel. Beginners dram.
3/2017. de Vere. Honey, malt, fruit, spice, ginger. Very nice.
it's a little hot on the first taste. the globe cube helps mellow it after a few min and then it is very drinkable.
Did not enjoy. Light color and flavor. Fruity and astringent.
Sweet toffee and butter on the nose. Initially sweet on the palate with a spicy ending on to a short, very smooth finish. A nice, light Scotch with no smoke.
Bit of a harsh nose, not an easy drinking whiskey...
I love this scotch! Sweet, light and smooth
A little harsh aftertaste. Short finish. Woody. Light and sweet. Not much there in body.
Reminds me of Balvenie 12 on the nose--balanced fruit, sweetness, and spice. Medium to light body with tart apples. Finish is short with some burn. Starts better than it finishes, but not bad.
